title: M3春2023 Announcement
content: This is the menu for #M3春2024, This time, it is a joint booth of Thoughost and ULTIMA GEAR. We also have a variety of items in stock for distribution on consignment. You can listen to the preview video for Hyoketsugensou's new album "Still Echoes of Departure" which was not listed in the menu, here. https://youtu.be/u4cpUnM1b2Y. We look forward to seeing you at the First Exhibition Hall J-03ab!
